attributes.action: Have the PM keep his promise that he made in 2019 and not raise taxes
attributes.additional_details: Why should the public have their national insurance raised by 1.25% ?? Where has all the money gone from brexit a the 350 million for NHS that was promised when HE decided on BREXIT?? This is unfair disgraceful and will hit families hard financially.. This need to be stopped. The government is taking liberties. Making promises they cannot keep.
attributes.background: We the people wat Boris Johnson to keep his promise of not raising any taxes for the lifetime of the government and not backtrack on it.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action:

Have the PM keep his promise that he made in 2019 and not raise taxes
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596514
